snippet: Several antismoking groups and branding and production companies have teamed up on a television commercial to fight the toxic pollution caused by discarded cigarette butts.
abstract: Several antismoking groups and branding and production companies have teamed up on television commercial to fight toxic pollution caused by discarded cigarette butts.
lead_paragraph: Several antismoking groups and branding and production companies have teamed up on a television commercial to fight the toxic pollution caused by discarded cigarette butts.

headline.seo: An Ad Campaign Fights Cigarette Butts as Toxic Waste
headline.main: A Campaign Fights the Cigarette Butt, a Ubiquitous Pollutant
headline.print_headline: A Campaign Fights The Cigarette Butt, A Ubiquitous Pollutant
